eventDescription: We're going to be picking up trash at [park name] to reduce the littering in the area.
Volunteer at the annual environment conference! Helpers are needed to set up and facilitate the event.
Climate change must be addressed! Come and let your voice be heard.
Do you have any used books? Please donate them to [library name]! A box will be set up in the lobby for drop-off.
We're students from [school name] and will be selling [stuff]. Please drop by and support our school.
